definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: only c. [[ה]] loc. [[זִפְרׂ֫נׇה]] Nu 34:9, place on northern boundary of Canaan; LXX Defrwna, )Efrwna; LXXL Zefrwna; site dub., Wetzst:Hauran 88 prop. Zifra)n, NE. fr. Damascus; Furrer:ZPV viii. 28 Bd:Pal 397 (‘ perh. ’) Za‘ferâne, between Ḥumṣ and Hamath; Di rejects both.
